overview.en: MOTT aimed at building a decentralized global travel travel platform, through the chain technology builds an enterprise the block chain application platform, using the block chain technology in distributed storage function, record store a lot of people, the scenic spot, merchants, travel company credit reputation, create a more efficient, transparent, credible and have self motivation of tourism ecology.
overview.zh: MOTT旨在建设一个去中心化的全球旅行出行平台，通过区块链技术搭建企业级区块链应用平台，利用区块链技术中的分布式储存功能，记录存储大量的个人，景区，商家，旅行公司信用口碑，创建一个更加高效、透明、可信且具备自我驱动力的旅游生态。
